name: Ice Cream Clown Maker (v.0.1)
description:
Make yourself a funny looking sugary snack!

Just drag and drop the different accessories to create your own Ice Cream Clown. Start off with a scoop (or more if you feel adventurous) and make a funny little guy with eyes, noses and mouths all made out of different types of candy. There's even cones for hats!

and he's already happy to see you!

Note : I will update the game with additional parts in the future, so stay tuned!
